content.html: No idea if this is real but it's funny as hell.
content.value: No idea if this is real but it's funny as hell.

photo.alt:
NarwhalsAreFalling (on Tumblr) posted:
"lol I went to delete a twitter account for reasons (I ran a satire account of my university's president) and it wouldn't let me.

Next post is a screenshot of someone who reblogged with "turn it into a musk parody account and get it banned"; Narwhals responds "EXCELLENT idea give me a moment"

Narwhal's next post is an image of the Twitter "Account suspended" page, which they caption "wow I can't believe that worked"

User avatar-tuner responds: "for reference: the time between "turn into musk parody" and "suspended" was 8 minutes.

content.html: I really don’t have anything more to say about ChatGPT, Galactica or whatever else they decide to put out next. We’ve written a paper about it, https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3442188.3445922 dealt with enough based on that. We need to spend our time slowly working on the technological future we think should exist, and we can’t do that if our time and imagination is hijacked by Open AI, the longtermists or whoever else.
content.value: I really don’t have anything more to say about ChatGPT, Galactica or whatever else they decide to put out next. We’ve written a paper about it, https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3442188.3445922 dealt with enough based on that. We need to spend our time slowly working on the technological future we think should exist, and we can’t do that if our  time and imagination is hijacked by Open AI, the longtermists or whoever else.

content.html:
I know that the term "round-robin" means something where everyone is put together with everyone else, like a collaboration where everyone works together or a competition where everyone faces each other. I know this and understand this.

But I hear the phrase and this is immediately where my brain goes
content.value: I know that the term "round-robin" means something where everyone is put together with everyone else, like a collaboration where everyone works together or a competition where everyone faces each other. I know this and understand this.But I hear the phrase and this is immediately where my brain goes

photo.alt: A floofy little robin sitting on a branch, all puffed up and looking exceedingly spherical.

content.html: Mastodon had grown so rich, he wanted to retire. He took me to his cabin and he told me his secret. 'I am not #JohnMastodon,' he said. 'My name is Ryan; I inherited the network from the previous John Mastodon, just as you will inherit it from me. The man I inherited it from is not the real John Mastodon either. His name was Cummerbund. The real Mastodon has been retired 15 years and living like a king in Patagonia.
content.value: Mastodon had grown so rich, he wanted to retire. He took me to his cabin and he told me his secret. 'I am not #JohnMastodon,' he said. 'My name is Ryan; I inherited the network from the previous John Mastodon, just as you will inherit it from me. The man I inherited it from is not the real John Mastodon either. His name was Cummerbund. The real Mastodon has been retired 15 years and living like a king in Patagonia.

photo.alt: Westly, not John Mastodon. A still from The Princess Bride.

content.html: Fell asleep in a sunbeam and woke up to see the Twitter's latest insanity. What a lovely day.

content.html:
🎲I've been working on Yonder, a Free dice roller that works within google sheets

Right now it supports PbtA, FitD and d20-like games, as well as Troika and Flying Circus directly

Try it and let it me know if it works for you!!

➡️➡️➡️Get it here: https://bit.ly/3MfBnLK
#ttrpg

content.html: in Norway, "up and not crying" is a not uncommon response to "how's it going" type questions, and I feel like that's a very reasonable standard to hold oneself to especially nowadays

content.html: In case you missed it yesterday (there was a "game awardz" thing) Emerald Woods, the free no-combat, #farming, exploration and creature collecting #roguelike, now has Graphics! Here's the full devlog including the progress with custom #pixelart by @carenalga https://blog.slashie.net/2022/12/08/emerald-woods-with-graphics-v0-2-0/
